An Uber 5-mile trip cost is not a fixed price and depends on location, demand (surge pricing), time of day, and the specific Uber service type. A rough estimate for a standard UberX trip might involve a base fare around $1-$2, a per-mile charge of $0.80-$1.50, and a per-minute rate, which could range from roughly $6.50 to $15.00 for a 5-mile trip, but will be higher or lower based on specific market conditions and service chosen. 5.6 mile trip. 22+ usd 10/28/25 raning

replyContent: Hi, the amount shown on the rider's device is the estimated amount calculated before the trip. After the ride has concluded, the amount shown on the driver's device is the actual amount to be paid. The fare can differ due to change in routes, traffic conditions or time taken. If there are any other queries, write to us at t.uber.com/contact .
